subject: Re: Iceweasel artwork rated PG?
body:
Hello,
This is the exact kind of attitude that should NEVER get into any serious project.
It is a total de-service to the community , throwing at waste basket thousand hours of coding efforts.
Regards.
Andre Felipe Machado




--

with a subject of "unsubscribe". Trouble? Contact listmaster@lists.debian.org
